full_summary:
### Solicitation Notice

#### Request for Standing Offer: Correlator Support

**Reference Number:** WS3893505643
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-10
**Closing Date:** 2023-06-26T14:00:00
**Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Notice Details:** 
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) seeks a standing offer for Correlator Support services to complement the existing NRC correlator team. The successful contractor will provide resources with specific skill sets, including project managers, systems and software engineers, and FPGA firmware engineers.

**Tender Description:**
The Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics (HAA) research centre of the NRC requires resources to support the design and deployment of correlator digital signal processing systems for large radio telescopes. The selected contractor will provide Correlator Support services in support of the ALMA and SKA projects, as well as other smaller projects.

**Key Requirements:**

* Project managers
* Systems and software engineers
* FPGA firmware engineers

**Regions of Operation:** 
The successful contractor will be required to perform work in the following regions:

* South Africa
* British Columbia
* Chile

**Trade Agreement:** 
This solicitation is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**End User Entity:**
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC)

**Contact Information:**
Brittney Jackson (SPAC/PSPC)
brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Access the Solicitation Notice:**
To access the full solicitation notice, please visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16238748?extsite=MTYyMzg3NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important Notes:**
Please ensure to review the solicitation notice thoroughly and submit your Standing Offer by the closing date and time specified above. Late submissions will not be accepted. Ensure that your Standing Offer meets all the requirements outlined in the solicitation notice.  Best regards.
